result.content:
Import
Smartpay.FitFixtures

Check Application
name?
Smartpay


CardTypesFixture
StartSmartpay

Cards and Surcharges

The list of card types and their valid PAN lengths are:

By default, all card types have a zero surcharge for all clients.
We can set the surcharges for certain cards for test purposes, and then query the

list of cards and surcharges.
For Example:
When we assign the following surcharges:

Comment
Setup Card Type Surcharges
Name Surcharge
Visa 0.50
Mastercard 1.00
Diners Club 0.90

Then Expect the Cards list to be as follows:

Comment
Card Types
Name Surcharge
Visa 0.50
Visa Debit 0.00
Visa Electron 0.00
MasterCard 1.00
Maestro 0.00
Visa Electron 0.00
American Express 0.00
JCB 0.00
Diners Club 0.90
